xinstall.name: Google Analytics (Tracking Code)
xinstall.description: Includes the GA tracking code on a website (not visible).

param.name: id
param.label: Account ID
param.description: The unique identifier given by Google Analytics.

param.name: domain
param.label: Domain name
param.description: The domain of your website (value for '_setDomainName').

param.name: code_type
param.label: Code type
param.description: Defines which Google Analytics tracking code should be used.
